channel.title: A smashing idea!
channel.description: well its been a long time but i planed to post this as just a idea but as many people know the hardest part of Rs privet servers is the model part and i have a proposition we can make the models but we cant repack them exactly but i have a idea build a custom compression program that packs them down and dose basicly what we have been trying to do but we need to do this the resone we cant repack it is the compression codec so we make our own it might take a while but i think its not to far way and the best part is we can use common model makeing programs to make the objects then run them threw a custom converter then a packer i have some ideas for how we could get this common goal but im going to need a team i can get the objects required but i need a team of semi skilled programers must meet the following requirements ----------------------------------------- Have some skill in one of the following arts Model crafting C++ C# or C Visual basic End of first list ---------------------------------------- for client development skilled in JAVA have a basic understanding of model and client codeing basicly how the model part of the client works ------------------------------------------- Resources i can provide Web hosting for transfer and distribution some model help and other things source code any thing else u need just ask and i will see what i can find ---------------------------------------------- for further info or to join my MSN is Madmurder55@hotmail.com any questions please ask but i will be waiting and researching extra info will be provided apon joining.

item.title: A smashing idea!
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

well its been a long time but i planed to post this as just a idea but
as many people know the hardest part of Rs privet servers is the model part and i have a proposition we can make the models but we cant repack them exactly but i have a idea
build a custom compression program that packs them down and dose basicly what we have been trying to do but we need to do this the resone we cant repack it is the compression codec so we make our own it might take a while but i think its not to far way and the best part is we can use common model makeing programs to make the objects then run them threw a custom converter then a packer i have some ideas for how we could get this common goal but im going to need a team i can get the objects required but i need a team of semi skilled programers must meet the following requirements

Have some skill in one of the following arts
Model crafting
C++
C#
or C
Visual basic
End of first list

for client development
skilled in JAVA
have a basic understanding of model and client codeing
basicly how the model part of the client works

Resources i can provide
Web hosting for transfer and distribution
some model help and other things
source code
any thing else u need just ask and i will see what i can find

for further info or to join
my MSN is Madmurder55@hotmail.com
any questions please ask but i will be waiting and researching
extra info will be provided apon joining.
